changelog_summary: ## v0.5.0 (2026-02-23) Added: - Public installer and update delivery flow now publishes each stable release automatically. - Improved operator landing page with clearer release/status visibility and direct installer/update references. - Public changelog delivery now follows a stable customer-facing format per release. Fixed: - Installer reliability issues that could interrupt setup in some environments. - Public changelog freshness issues on the delivery homepage. Changed:
